goals__remit: The CCSA brings together a wide range of specialist companies across the spectrum of CCS technology, as well as a variety of support services to the energy sector. The Association exists to represent the interests of its members in promoting the business of CCS and to assist policy developments in the UK and the EU towards a long term regulatory framework for CCS, as a means of abating carbon dioxide emissions.
relevant_communication: The CCSA holds semi-regular meetings with Commission officials and Members of the European Parliament depending on the progress of relevant files. The CCSA does not typically host relevant events but did so once in 2015, hosting a joint European Parliament Hearing on CCS with the European Technology Platform for Zero Emissions Fossil Fuel Plant (ZEP).
